Package org.sibermatica.jah.util

Class OptionParser

java.lang.Object
org.sibermatica.jah.util.OptionParser
public final class OptionParser extends Object

OptionParser

This class is used to parse command line arguments. Commonly, we need arguments to easily handle our programs. But now we always have a library that facilitates this process. Then we implemented this class to facilitate this process of parsing arguments.
Since:
1.3
Author:
Ciro Alejo Diaz

    • getOrDefault

      public Object getOrDefault​(String key, Object default_obj)
      Returns the value of a map key. If the key is null, invalid or empty returns other value.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to get the value for.
      default_obj - the value to return if the key is null, invalid or empty.
      Returns:
      the value of the map key or default value if the key is null

    • format

      public static OptionParser format​(String OPTION, String MAP_OPTION)
      Formats the arguments selecting format for arguments and for options.
      Parameters:
      OPTION - formats the arguments for options.
      MAP_OPTION - formats the arguments for map options.
      Returns:
      OptionParser instance but correctly formatted.

    • getIgnoredOptions

      public ArrayList<String> getIgnoredOptions()
      Returns options that are invalid for be arguments. Then, you can get them.
      Returns:
      options that are invalid for be arguments.
